q1: Do you think this team will qualify for the next World Cup?
a1: No, Barcelona is not an international team.
q2: But they will try to win the Champions League.
a2: Yes, they'll probably do pretty well in that competition.
q3: Yes, I believe that Barcelona will win the champions league
a3: Who do you think Barcelona's biggest competition is?
a4: Barcelona is a very good team
q5: if it is one of the best in the world
a5: I think Barcelona is the best team
